ygData.subject: Re: Suggestions?
ygData.msgSnippet: I like to think they re made of bad elf hide, and some mutant strain of them that isn t sentient at all but could be easily mistaken for, say, a bear ;-) ...
ygData.messageBody:
I like to think they're made of bad elf hide, and some mutant strain
of them that isn't sentient at all but could be easily mistaken for,
say, a bear ;-)

On Tue, 12 Oct 1999 15:23:47 -0600, you wrote:

>From: "Kimes, Dean W." <Dean_Kimes@...>
>
>Hmmm, is that what these funny looking gloves are made of? are you sure?
>That's disgusting surely they just call'em that, they aren't really made of
>the skin of a sentient being at all, naw just another marketing ploy like
>Naugahide right?
>

--

Saldara
High Elf Wizard (27), Mith Marr

Melaniel
Wood Elf Bard (14), Mith Marr
